input.sentences: we had big plans for the mixer and rented out a large facility .
however | when we got there | we realized it would take a lot of work !
so | we rented a rental truck and brought the materials we needed .
soon after | we had painted a beautiful mural and the party as ready to take off .
and | we waited outside for the party to arrive .
output.sentences: We were organising the party of the century!
We rented local property and got started to set up our party plan.
We painted and decorated all day and all night.
We painted backdrops to match our theme.
Finally the party set was ready to go.
